front.title: Towards Definition of a Management Information Base for Multimedia Resources

abstract.t: This memo defines a MIB for use with managing multimedia resources. This generic term encompasses all resources that are designed to handle multimedia information, that is information made up of one or more information types such as text, video, speech, sound, graphics and animation. This MIB instruments attributes common to all multimedia resources, irrespective of their specific functionalities. Therefore, the MIB aims at defining a skeleton to be instantiated for any multimedia resource of interest.
